consequences.text: Sorry the developer is to much of a procrastinator to make setting

situation.text: You are before the massive door of the dungeon of Naheulbeuk

consequences.text: After some more thought you decide that the adventure is not worth the risk. You go home and live an happy life with a baker daughter. YOU LOSE

You gather all your force and hit the door... But it doesn't move an inch.
 You in the other hand... You are thrown back on the ground.

You knock on the door remembering that the dungeon is from the era where the hero would knock on the door so the dungeon master could have his "mysterious" door opening.
The door slowly open to reveal the grand entry hall.
"OH GOD DAMN IT! I will burn them to the ground" you think as you discover the ads hanged between the beams

situation.text:
You are now inside the massive hall of the dungeon. You see the doors of the inh and of the gift shop that opened during the era of "freemium dungeon"
You also see the stairs that lead you to the begin of the adventure

consequences.text: Maybe you could have something to drink before you begin the adventure
Nope! There is no fucking way you take part of this monetization scheme
